verses.roman:
grantha bāḍe, punarukti haya ta' kathana
tāhāṅ ye nā likhiluṅ, tāhā kariye likhana

synonyms: grantha—the size of the book; bāḍe—increases; punaḥ-ukti—repetition; haya—would be; ta' kathana—of subject matters once described; tāhāṅ—there (in the Seventh Chapter); ye—whatever; nā likhiluṅ—I have not described; tāhā—that; kariye likhana—I am writing.
translation: Since I have already described this incident very elaborately in the Seventh Chapter of Ādi-līlā, I do not wish to increase the size of this book by giving another description. However, I shall try to include in this chapter whatever was not described there.
